qbraid.transpiler.GateWrapper¶

class GateWrapper[source]¶

Abstract class for qbraid gate wrapper objects.

matrix¶

matrix representing the gate

Type

numpy.ndarray

name¶

name of the gate

Type

optional[str]

gate_type¶

the abstract name of the gate. No matter the way a gate is named in the underlying packet, this string follows qbraid’s conventions, which can be found here.

Type

str

num_controls¶

Default is 0.

Type

int

base_gate¶

the single- or two-qubit gate being controlled. Defaults to None.

Type

qbraid.transpiler.gate.GateWrapper

params¶

all the parameters associated with the gate. These may be abstract parameters or simply numbers.

Type

list[int,float,ParamID]

__init__()[source]¶

Methods

__init__()

transpile(package, output_param_mapping)

Transpile a qbraid quantum gate wrapper object to quantum gate object of type
